wiki.summary: “ecstacy” is the debut single from SUICIDAL-IDOL and sees their desire and want for a relationship to the point of euphoria often attributed to the club-drug ecstasy, over a grungy, heavy-bass instrumental. In July 2023, the track gained mass popularity on the social-media platform TikTok, with certain videos amassing over one-hundred-thousand views each. These videos ranged from flaunting looks and self-confidence to cosplayers expressing their passion for the hobby, and controversially attributed with the “Blackpill” community. Read more on Last.fm.
